paragraphs.content: They that trust in the LORD shall be as mount Zion, which cannot be removed, but abideth for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: They that trust in the Lord shall be as mount Zion, which cannot be removed, but abideth for ever.

paragraphs.content: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the LORD is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As the mountains are round about Jerusalem, so the Lord is round about his people from henceforth even for ever.

paragraphs.content: For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.
paragraphs.contentHtml: For the rod of the wicked shall not rest upon the lot of the righteous; lest the righteous put forth their hands unto iniquity.

paragraphs.content: Do good, O LORD, unto those that be good, and to them that are upright in their hearts.
paragraphs.contentHtml: Do good, O Lord, unto those that be good, and to them that are upright in their hearts.

paragraphs.content: As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, the LORD shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: but peace shall be upon Israel.
paragraphs.contentHtml: As for such as turn aside unto their crooked ways, the Lord shall lead them forth with the workers of iniquity: but peace shall be upon Israel.
